ComicInfo.Title: Chapter Four
ComicInfo.Series: Stranger Things: The Tomb of Ybwen
ComicInfo.Summary: Greg Pak! Diego Galindo! With the storm still raging outside, our group of adventurers have finally found the treasure inside the Tomb of Ybwen! However, when the contents of the treasure prove disappointing, Will's anger gets the better of him. Now, with Mr. Clarke's condition worsening and the gang still stuck inside the mine, Will must face the consequences for his actions and come to terms with his grief.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-03 09:55:11. [CVDB900367] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-09 20:18:05. [Issue ID 2290359]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Adam Gorham,Mack Chater,Marc Aspinall,Simone Di Meo
